statements: DELETE FROM InmateRecords WHERE inmate_id = 100 AND inmate_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM InmateRecords WHERE admission_date < '2022-01-01' AND rehabilitation_progress > 50;
DELETE FROM inmate_records WHERE inmate_id = 100 AND release_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM rehabilitation_progress WHERE progress_date < '2021-12-01' AND inmate_id = 200;
DELETE FROM inmates WHERE inmate_id = 1 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM inmate_offenses WHERE inmate_id = 5 AND offense_id = 3;
